disclaimerText: This forecast is intended to provide information on expected pollution levels in areas of significant public exposure. It may not apply in very specific locations close to unusually strong or short-lived local sources of pollution.

currentForecast.forecastSummary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Wednesday 29 June to end of Thursday 30 June GMT
currentForecast.forecastText: Wednesday forecast to have cloud cover and some showers arriving from the west. Some sunny spells in the afternoon with further rain. Heavy showers on Thursday. <br/><br/>A steady feed of south westerly air arriving from the Atlantic should give good dispersion of local emissions while bearing little imported pollution. <br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' for the following pollutants throughout the forecast period:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>PM10 Particulate<br/>PM2.5 Particulate<br/>Ozone<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/><br/><br/>

currentForecast.forecastSummary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Thursday 30 June to end of Thursday 30 June GMT
currentForecast.forecastText: Heavy showers are expected on Thursday. <br/><br/>A steady feed of south westerly air arriving from the Atlantic should give good dispersion of local emissions while bearing little imported pollution. <br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' for the following pollutants throughout the forecast period:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>PM10 Particulate<br/>PM2.5 Particulate<br/>Ozone<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/><br/><br/>
